text:
Francis Ralph Quilici (May 11, 1939 – May 14, 2018) was a former Major League infielder and manager. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He had a five-year playing career and a four-year managerial career. He played for the Minnesota Twins of the American League in 1965, then 1967-1970.
Quilici died on May 14, 2018 in Minneapolis, Minnesota at the age of 79.
